#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
void magical(ll k)
{
	char str[30];
	int i=0;
	while(k)
	{
		int x = k%5;
		x = x*2;
		str[i++] = char(x+48);
		k = k/5;
	}
	str[i]='\0';
	int n=strlen(str);
	for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		cout<<str[i];
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	ll k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>k;
		if(k==1)
			cout<<"0";
		else
			magical(k-1);
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
